mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_order ( order_id, ticket_id, entry_time, quantity, create_time, total_price, status, is_pay, user_id, remark, order_no, ticket_icon, ticket_name, ticket_desc, end_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{ticketId}, #{entryTime}, #{quantity}, #{createTime}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{isPay}, #{userId}, #{remark}, #{orderNo}, #{ticketIcon}, #{ticketName}, #{ticketDesc}, #{endTime} )

INSERT INTO mc_order_detail ( order_detail_id, order_id, ticket_id, ticket_name, ticket_detail_id, ticket_detail_name, price, market_price, type, code ) VALUES ( #{orderDetailId}, #{orderId}, #{ticketId}, #{ticketName}, #{ticketDetailId}, #{ticketDetailName}, #{price}, #{marketPrice}, #{type}, #{code} )
INSERT INTO mc_order_visitor ( order_visitor_id, order_id, name, telephone, card_type, idcard ) VALUES ( #{orderVisitorId}, #{orderId}, #{name}, #{telephone}, #{cardType}, #{idcard} )
mapper.select: select order_id as orderId, ticket_id as ticketId, entry_time as entryTime, quantity as quantity, create_time as createTime, total_price as totalPrice, status as status, is_pay as isPay, user_id as userId, remark as remark, order_no as orderNo, ticket_icon as ticketIcon, ticket_name as ticketName, ticket_desc as ticketDesc, end_time as endTime from mc_order where status = #{0} and user_id = #{1} order by create_time desc
